summary: SkyMute collects minimal personal data via Google login for link box creation and sharing. Users create public boxes accessible by 3-digit codes that may be indexed by search engines. The app strictly prohibits adult content, with violations resulting in content removal and possible account actions. We do not sell user data and respect user rights to access and delete their content.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.description: We collect only the data necessary to operate the App, provide core features, improve functionality, and maintain a safe environment.

metadata: Date and time of box creation
Number of links in a box
voluntarilyProvided.note: We do not access your password or post on your behalf. You control the content within your boxes.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
purposes: To create and manage link boxes
To generate and associate short codes for sharing
To allow users to discover content via codes
To monitor abuse and enforce platform guidelines
To improve App functionality, usability, and performance

sections.title: Public Content and Sharing
sections.description: Each link box you create is intended for public sharing using a short 3-digit code. Anyone with this code can view your box content.
sections.indexing: Boxes may be indexed by public search engines (e.g., Google, Bing)
sections.warning: Do not include private or sensitive information in public boxes
userControl: Add, update, or remove links at any time
Delete your box (may remove it from indexing, but cached versions may persist)
sections.consent: By sharing a box code, you consent to public visibility of that content.

sections.title: Content Guidelines and Moderation
sections.responsibility: All content on SkyMute is user-generated. We do not create or upload any content ourselves.

adultContentPolicy.statement: SkyMute does not allow sexual, adult, or explicit content of any kind. Content that violates this rule will be immediately removed, and the responsible account may be suspended or banned.

prohibitedContent: Scam links, malware, or deceptive content
sections.reporting: Users can report inappropriate content directly within the app. Reported content is reviewed, and violations will lead to content removal or account actions.
sections.enforcement: SkyMute reserves the right to block or remove any content or user that violates these policies or applicable laws.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.note: While we work hard to ensure security, no system is completely safe. Please share responsibly.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.note: Some links may direct to external sites; we are not responsible for their practices.

sections.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights: Withdraw consent or delete your account
Contact authorities for data protection concerns
sections.howToExercise: Contact us at skymute@skymute.com. You can also manage/delete boxes directly in the app.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.description: SkyMute is not for children under 13 (or local minimum age). We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If discovered, such data will be deleted.

sections.title: International Users
sections.description: By using SkyMute, you agree to your data being processed as per this Privacy Policy, regardless of where you're located.

sections.title: Policy Updates
sections.description: We may update this Privacy Policy. Major changes will be communicated via in-app notice. Continued use means acceptance of the updated terms.

sections.title: Paid LinkBox Details
sections.description: Paid LinkBox lets users make their link box paid. Users can charge people to access their links using a weekly subscription.
features: Users can set the price of their LinkBox from ₹20 to ₹20,000.
To buy a subscription, customers must add money to their wallet first.
Wallet recharge amounts are from ₹20 to ₹10,000.
The wallet balance is used to pay for the subscription.
importantNotes: Once a user recharges their wallet, the added amount cannot be refunded.
Wallet balance is non-transferable and cannot be withdrawn as cash.
Refunds are not provided for accidental or incorrect wallet recharges.
Refunds are not provided for unused wallet balance.
Refunds are not provided for subscription purchases made using wallet balance.
Users are responsible for checking all payment details before recharging their wallet.
By recharging the wallet, the user agrees to this no-refund policy.
sections.consequences: Violation or misuse of the wallet or subscription system may result in restriction of access to Paid LinkBox features or account-level actions as per platform policies.
